patch 8.1.2399: info popup on top of cursor if it doesn't fit

Problem:    Info popup on top of cursor if it doesn't fit.
Solution:   Hide the popup if it doesn't fit.

attachments.text: Problem: Info popup on top of cursor if it doesn't fit. Solution: Hide the popup if it doesn't fit.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/88a3e2b2ac33e3bb4b7cf9132eb75db051e8f4ed|patch 8.1.2401: :cexpr does not handle | in expression>
patch 8.1.2401: :cexpr does not handle | in expression

Problem:    :cexpr does not handle | in expression.
Solution:   Remove EX_TRLBAR and set nextcmd pointer.

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2401: :cexpr does not handle | in expression · vim/vim@88a3e2b
attachments.text: Problem: :cexpr does not handle | in expression. Solution: Remove EX_TRLBAR and set nextcmd pointer.
